title: Session Context and Progress Documentation
description: This session involved: 1) Investigating MCP tool accessibility issues, 2) Fixing MCP configuration (enableAllProjectMcpServers), 3) Correcting Notion HTTP endpoint format, 4) Removing obsolete FastMCP system, 5) Updating token values in MCP config, 6) Learning correct MCP tool naming patterns. Final status: MCP properly configured, FastMCP removed, ready for Notion database creation with 47 Humanitix fields.
